CustomField.formula: IF(CLose_Date_Month_Number__c = 1, "January", IF(CLose_Date_Month_Number__c = 2, "February", IF(CLose_Date_Month_Number__c = 3, "March", IF(CLose_Date_Month_Number__c = 4, "April", IF(CLose_Date_Month_Number__c = 5, "May", IF(CLose_Date_Month_Number__c = 6, "June", IF(CLose_Date_Month_Number__c = 7, "July", IF(CLose_Date_Month_Number__c = 8, "August", IF(CLose_Date_Month_Number__c = 9, "September", IF(CLose_Date_Month_Number__c = 10, "October", IF(CLose_Date_Month_Number__c = 11, "November", IF(CLose_Date_Month_Number__c = 12, "December", "N/A"))))))))))))
CustomField.label: Close Month
